name: Superbug
description:
Superbug is a top down shooter where you survive for as long as you can

In this short game you play as a virus trapped in a body with no escape and no way out.

You will have to fight against the immune system for as long as possible and change to become stronger, but beware..the immune system will also adapt to you.

Features

  • Local highscore table
  • Survival game mode
  • In-game shop (Using DNA gathered from blood cells)
  • The sad sting when you get beaten within the first six minutes
  • The nice feeling when you get beaten over the first six minutes

Planned future

Adding more abilities and upgrades to them(A temporary shield, a temporary projectile change, etc and shortening cooldown times)

Add a full screen option

Having enemy spawning adapt to how you play

Changing sprites (add a few touches here and there, make them look more squishy)

To animate that cover used for the website

Controls

Uses mouse and keyboard

Mouse is for controlling the Virus's movements

Holding left mouse to activate mutation mode (explained more ingame)

Keyboard is used for pause and an ability
